document_data.name: Aglonell
document_data.mainbody: '''Aglonell''' was a hunter in [[Icewind Dale]] in [[1485 DR]].
document_data.History: Aglonell was a trapper and hunter living near [[Bryn Shander]] in the [[Ten Towns]]. In 1485, he warned of the threat of [[Hedrun Arnsfirth]] after finding several traps raided and small animals stolen. In fact, the culprits were [[wererat]]s of [[Ship Rethnor]]. Aglonell spoke of his problems with [[Mithann]], who recruited adventurers to investigate.
